overview: Luka Šulić and Stjepan Hauser along with the Zagreb Soloists performed two days in a row at the Lisinski Concert Hall presenting a classical music repertoire. During these unique music evenings, held on the 9th and the 10th of June, 2CELLOS showed how cello sounds while playing Vivaldi, Bach, Rachmaninov, Morricone, Zimmer ...
title: 2CELLOS - Back to the Roots
